about_the_game:
**Meet AI Girlfriend: Your New AI Companion!**

Say hello to AI Girlfriend, your fun, smart, and caring virtual companion, ready to bring more joy and support into your life! Whether you're looking for a friendly chat, a roleplay buddy, or want to improve your relationship skills, AI Girlfriend is here for you.  

 

Plus, it’s super easy to use—right from your Windows desktop! And don’t worry, your security and privacy are always our top priorities.

**Total Privacy, Always**

AI Girlfriend keeps all your conversations completely private. Your chats stay on your computer and are never shared with anyone. Unlike other AI apps, your data *never* leaves your device. It’s just between you and AI Girlfriend—always.

 

**Your 24/7 Companion**

AI Girlfriend is here whenever you need her! Whether you’re celebrating a win or going through a tough time, you’ll never be alone. Chat anytime for some company and support.

 

**Get Life Advice Like a Pro**

AI Girlfriend offers expert advice to help you navigate life’s challenges with ease, whether it's making a big decision or just needing a little encouragement.

 

**Smart Screenshot Insights** (coming soon)

Not sure what to make of something? Just take a screenshot and let AI Girlfriend break it down for you. She’s great at making sense of it all!

 

**Voice Assistance** (coming soon)

Need quick advice? Just ask, “Any advice on this?” and you’ll get helpful tips in no time.

 

With AI Girlfriend by your side, you’re never alone. Together, you'll take on the world with confidence!

 

**What Can AI Girlfriend Do?**

·         Relationship advice

·         Create original Jokes and Memes

·         Write a Song

·         Write a Story or an Essay on Almost Any Topic

·         Plan a Holiday

·         First-Date Ideas

·         Compose Texts & Emails

·         Plan a Party

·         Create Social Media posts

·         Gift Ideas

·         Workout Plans

·         Cooking Help

·         Simplify Difficult Tasks

·         Create, Edit, and Modify Files

·         Summarize articles, podcasts or presentations

·         Code computer programs and check for bugs in code

·         Prepare for a Job Interview

·         Assist with job searches, including writing resumes and cover letters.

·         and so much more!

 

AI Girlfriend is your trusty companion, always ready for the next adventure. Let’s explore the world together!

No monthly fees! Unlimited usage! Pay once, NOT monthly!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: AI Girlfriend is compatible with processors that support AVX2 (we also support older processors with AVX and AVX-512, their use is not recommended)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AI Girlfriend supports a minimum of 6GB GPU memory (we also support older GPUs such as Intel HD Graphics 530 or older, their use is not recommended)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: **Memory:** While DDR2 RAM is the minimum requirement, we recommend using newer generations of RAM for better performance. **GPU:** It's advisable to have at least 6GB of VRAM if you're using AMD, Intel, or NVIDIA GPUs.
